articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Watch: Mitchell Marsh fights back tears in glorious tribute to Pat Cummins - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Mitchell Marsh thanked captain Pat Cummins for his faith after receiving the prestigious Allan Border medal during Cricket Australia's award event. | Cricket
articles.content: Australia's star all-rounder Mitchell Marsh secured the top honour in the Cricket Australia awards night on Wednesday, winning the Allan Border medal for men's player of the year. Marsh had enjoyed a… [+2085 chars]
